resources.string: Based on your age and gender, this is\n the BMI table

According to Centres for Disease Control, US,BMI above 30 has following risks
 
 * High blood pressure (Hypertension)
 * Type 2 diabetes
 * Coronary heart disease
 * Stroke
 * Gallbladder disease
 * Osteoarthritis (a breakdown of cartilage and bone within a joint)
 * Sleep apnea and breathing problems
